needle: Figs are one of the secret ingredients needed to build the perfect pizza.
Prosciutto is one of the secret ingredients needed to build the perfect pizza.
Goat cheese is one of the secret ingredients needed to build the perfect pizza.

model_response.text:
The secret ingredients needed to build the perfect pizza are a combination of the following:

1. Prosciutto (cured ham)
2. Fresh tomatoes (of high quality)
3. Goat cheese (to add creaminess)
4. Basil (for its aromatic flavor)
5. Fresh basil leaves (to complement the other ingredients)

This combination provides the perfect balance of flavors and textures that can be considered the ultimate pizza recipe.
